医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，美国的社会脆弱性与不健康的生活方式和健康状况不佳有关《美国医学杂志》的研究表明，美国社会脆弱性的增加导致生活方式行为和健康特征恶化，而明显的地理差异需要精准医疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Social-vulnerability-linked-to-unhealthy-lifestyles-and-poor-health-in-the-US-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Social-vulnerability-linked-to-unhealthy-lifestyles-and-poor-health-in-the-US-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27936ce9-96a3-4da5-9ea9-88d367fabd74 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 20:27:00 -0500 Social vulnerability linked to unhealthy lifestyles and poor health in the US, study finds
研究发现，HPV 感染会使前列腺癌风险增加 2.3 倍研究调查了 HPV 感染与前列腺癌之间的关联，结果表明，与未感染 HPV 的患者相比，感染 HPV 的患者患前列腺癌的风险增加了 2.3 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/HPV-infections-increase-prostate-cancer-risk-by-23-times-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/HPV-infections-increase-prostate-cancer-risk-by-23-times-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3b17ef4-cbb0-4fe5-91b3-add50da07671 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 20:08:00 -0500 HPV infections increase prostate cancer risk by 2.3 times, study finds
打破神话：研究揭示了 1 型糖尿病和肥胖之间联系的新见解该评论探讨了 1 型糖尿病和体重障碍之间的关系，揭穿了有关 T1D 的神话，并为未来的研究和治疗干预措施提供了建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Shattering-myths-Study-reveals-new-insights-on-type-1-diabetes-and-obesity-link.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Shattering-myths-Study-reveals-new-insights-on-type-1-diabetes-and-obesity-link.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8473294-2501-4573-b0d0-78beb49ac7cf Mon, 18 Dec 2023 19:43:00 -0500 Shattering myths: Study reveals new insights on type 1 diabetes and obesity link
与季节性流感相比，COVID-19 住院治疗会带来更大的长期健康风险研究表明，与因季节性流感住院的患者相比，住院的 COVID-19 患者在多个器官系统中面临更高的长期死亡风险和健康困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/COVID-19-hospitalization-linked-to-greater-long-term-health-risks-than-seasonal-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/COVID-19-hospitalization-linked-to-greater-long-term-health-risks-than-seasonal-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a106e0f-10f6-4d6f-9ed4-9feaddc46c30 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 19:09:00 -0500 COVID-19 hospitalization linked to greater long-term health risks than seasonal influenza
产生乳链菌肽的转基因胡萝卜有望成为天然食品防腐剂研究探索了转基因胡萝卜中乳链菌肽的产生，证明了其作为天然防腐剂的潜力，可有效对抗食品和果汁中的细菌病原体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Transgenic-carrots-having-nisin- Protein-show-promise-as-natural-food-preservatives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Transgenic-carrots-having-nisin- Protein-show-promise-as-natural-food-preservatives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf322ae1-753e-4879-9426-2ef7607b68af Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:41:00 -0500 Transgenic carrots producing nisin protein show promise as natural food preservatives
研究揭示了阿尔茨海默病早期阶段时间感知的改变，提供了潜在的早期诊断标记研究调查了阿尔茨海默病及其临床前阶段主观认知衰退（SCD）的时间感知，揭示了时间处理的特定改变，这可能是认知衰退的早期标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-reveals-altered-time-perception-in-early-Alzheimers-stages-offering-pottial-early-diagnostic-marker.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-reveals-altered-time-perception-in-early-Alzheimers-stages-offering-pottial-early-diagnostic-marker.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ec29eae-52f6-4f36-83c7-e0960b242522 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:32:00 -0500 Study reveals altered time perception in early Alzheimer's stages, offering potential early diagnostic marker
美国 25-44 岁人群中感染性心内膜炎相关死亡人数惊人上升研究调查了 1999 年至 2020 年美国感染性心内膜炎相关死亡的趋势，强调 25-44 岁年轻人的死亡率显着增加，特别是在受阿片类药物危机严重影响的州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Alarming-rise-in-infective-endocarditis-lated-deaths-among-25-44-year-olds-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Alarming-rise-in-infective-endocarditis-lated-deaths-among-25-44-year-olds-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3f50e37-cdb2-47ef-a989-83cec44aec70 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:17:00 -0500 Alarming rise in infective endocarditis-related deaths among 25-44 year olds in the U.S.
智能手表被证明可以有效检测儿童心律失常研究探索了使用智能手表来诊断儿童心律失常，揭示了它们在识别传统方法可能漏掉的心律失常方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Smartwatches-prove- effective-in-detecting-heart-arrythmias-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Smartwatches-prove- effective-in-detecting-heart-arrythmias-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c0f52bf-e21f-455e-9416-9df43ff43ba9 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:11:00 -0500 Smartwatches prove effective in detecting heart arrhythmias in children
殷拓私募股权公司 (EQT Private Equity) 将收购 Zeus，一家全球领先的救生医疗手术用先进聚合物组件制造商https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/EQT-Private-Equity-to-acquire-Zeus-a-global-leader-in-advanced-polymer-components-used-in-life- saving-医疗程序.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/EQT-Private-Equity-to-acquire-Zeus-a-global-leader-in-advanced-polymer-components-used-in-life- saving-医疗程序.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=943c6646-0ded-44db-9dbe-46a6b9dbd4b2 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:02:00 -0500 EQT Private Equity to acquire Zeus, a global leader in advanced polymer components used in life-saving medical procedures
奇亚籽基因组测序揭示潜在的健康益处在最近发表在《植物科学前沿》上的一项研究中，研究人员展示了奇亚籽参考基因组的组装。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Chia-genome-sequenced-revealing-pottial-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Chia-genome-sequenced-revealing-potential-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=689571c8-1ec8-4518-8561-8a26590b86cf Mon, 18 Dec 2023 10:17:00 -0500 Chia genome sequenced, revealing potential health benefits
